description: Hitech & Development Wireless Sweden Holding AB engages in the provision of Internet of Things and location services through Griffin cloud platform and Griffin Enterprise Positioning System (GEPS). The company is headquartered in Kista, Stockholm and currently employs 27 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2017-12-22. The technology makes it possible to analyze, automate and streamline flows and processes in a number of areas. The operations are based on the cloud-based software platforms Griffin IoT Cloud Service and the Griffin Enterprise Positioning System (GEPS). The solutions are offered in the form of WiFi and Bluetooth modules, which are integrated into customers' products. The Company’s operations are divided into three segments: Enterprise, Labs and Connectivity.
naicsNationalIndustry: Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing
name: Hitech & Development Wireless Sweden Holding AB (publ)
